HELLO!

WE ARE AN EVENT AGENCY

AVANTAGE PROJECT

The founders of the project are two strong professionals with many years of expertise in the field of event services, who have created a team that has become a top player in the market

[ about us ]

You may not know us yet, but you definitely know our projects. Under the leadership of Lilia Fedorova and Maria Rudakova during 10 years on the market we have realised unforgettable large-scale events for different businesses. Most of our clients tend to come back to us with new exciting projects: Avito, QIWI, Alfa-Bank, VK, Car of the Year, Lukoil, Sberbank, Promsvyazbank, Re:store, START.ru, VEKA, Wargaming.net, Garena, ADV Consulting, Metadynea, ANALPA, etc. work with us.

>

completed projects

Under the leadership of Lilia Fedorova and Maria Rudakova, during our 10 years on the market, we have created unforgettable and meaningful events for a wide range of companies.

>

unique event scenarios

We are happy to share our experience and expertise, and to discuss each stage of our work in detail. We work with you to find the best solutions to your current business challenges. We love strong collaborations and will be your reliable partner for many years to come.

>

year

in the industry

In 2014, we made the decision to move to an Agile system before many companies did. In 2018, we started working partially remotely, before it became mainstream. In 2020, we looked outside the box and learned how to make hybrid events so exceptional that we started winning awards for them.
